General.Name: Suwen Tekstil Sanayi Pazarlama AS
General.Description: Suwen Tekstil Sanayi Pazarlama A.S. operates in the women's underwear, home wear, and beach wear sector in Turkey. It provides a range of products, which include underwear, home dressing, beach, and pregnant/puertomacy, as well as socks/tights; products for male, such as underpants, athlete, pyjamas, and socks. The company sells its products in retail stores with its own brand, and on its own e-commerce website and e-commerce platforms, as well as in the aisles of some multi-section stores with its own brand. Suwen Tekstil Sanayi Pazarlama A.S. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Tatlisu Mah. Goksu Cad., Istanbul, Turkey, 34774
